"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song is perfect for when you need to push through a tough challenge or obstacle. The lyrics encourage you to stay focused and determined, which can help you stay motivated during difficult times.

"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This classic rock song is all about perseverance and believing in yourself. It's a great choice if you're feeling down or discouraged, as it reminds you that anything is possible if you keep trying.

"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This upbeat disco anthem is a great choice if you want to celebrate your resilience and strength. The lyrics encourage you to keep going even when things get tough, and the catchy melody will make you want to dance.

"Imagine" by John Lennon - This peaceful and inspiring song encourages you to imagine a world without war or prejudice. It's a great choice if you want to focus on positive thinking and hope for a better future.

"Hakuna Matata" from The Lion King - This fun and carefree song reminds you to take things one day at a time and not worry too much about the future. It's a great choice if you need to relax and let go of stress and anxiety.
